r.d: Package to validate Credit Card numbers and types.
r.n: - Split from Validate into independent package - BC break: creditCard() method now named number() and creditCardType() method is now named type() - Request #2194 Improved CreditCard validation with CreditCard Type check, patch by Philippe - Added a cvv() method to check card verification value (aka CVV2, CVC, CID, CSC, CIN)
